titleStmt.title: SII 12.132: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 132. (A.R. No. 411 of 1918). TIRUPPAṄGŪR, SHIYALI TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE FIRST PRĀKĀRA IN THE ŚIVALŌKANĀTHASVĀMIN TEMPLE.

summary.p: The subjoined record is also dated in the 2nd year of Sakalabhuvanachakravartin Kōpperuñjiṅgadēva. It registers a gift of land, after purchase, from a certain Ārāvamudu-Bhaṭṭaṉ by Śīyārūrdēvaṉ Ādichchadēvaṉ of Kuṟuchchi in Kiḷiyūr-nāḍu, a subdivision of Pāṇḍikulāśaṉi-vaḷanāḍu for the early morning service, sacred bath on Saturdays, unguents, garlands and offerings to the god Śivalōkamuḍaiya-Nāyaṉār at Tiruppuṉgūr in Tiruvāli-nāḍu, a subdivision of Rājādhirāja-vaḷanāḍu.
The astronomical details given in the record correspond to A.D. 1245, February 16, Thursday, with the emendation ba. 4 for ba. 14.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉacakkaravattikaḷ śrīkopperuñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu 2vatu kumpa nāyaṟṟu
Aparapakṣattu caturtdhdaciyum viyāḻakkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Attattunāḷ Irājādhirājavaḷanāṭṭut tiru
vālināṭṭut tiruppuṉkūr Uṭaiyār civalokamuṭaiyanāyaṉār koyilil Āticaṇṭeśvara tevarkaṉmikaḷu
kku pāṇṭikulācaṉivaḷanāṭṭuk kiḷiyūrnāṭṭu kuṟucciyuṭaiyāṉ ciyārurtevaṉ Āticcatevaneṉ teṉa . Iṉṉāyanār
kku tiruppaḷḷiyeḻuccic caṉittirumañcaṉam ĀṭiAruḷavum tirumeṟppūccut tiruppaḷḷit tāmattukkum tiruvamutupaṭikkum Uṭai
yārkku tiruvamutuArici ṉānāḻikkum nācciyārkku tiruvamutarici Irunāḻikkum Ākat tiru Amutarici Aṟunāḻikkum kaṟiviñcaṉattukku
m tiruviḷakku Eṇṇaikkum Uṭalākavum Iccoṟu Ikkālattu tevai Aṟuttārkku jivaṉtamāka kaṭavatākavum . tiruppaḷḷiyeḻuccippu
ṟamāka nāṉ nirvārktuk kuṭutta nilamāvatu . Iṉnāyaṉār tevatāṉam Iṉṉāṭṭu kaḻumalavāy Āṟṟukku vaṭakkuppaṭṭa civalokanāyakamaṅ
Eṉ kāṇṇiyāṉa śrīmaṅkali vaṭakūṟu nilam kha 4 � � ntam Ārāvamutupaṭṭaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭu Aṉupavittu varukiṟa teṉkaṇ
licciṉṉamum maṉaiyil muṉṟopāti meṟkkaṭaya
cātaṉappaṭiye tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka kūṭṭikko
ḷḷakkaṭavatākavum śrīmaṅkali nilattu turavilu maccikkuḻiyilum nikki niṉ
la cātaṉappaṭi muṉṟopātiyum Ippaṭi Eṉ cātaṉappaṭiye tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka tirumāḷikaiyil kalveṭṭi nirvārttuk kuṭut
kaṉmmikaḷukku kuṟucciUṭaiyār ciyārurtevaṉ Āticcatevaṉeṉ Āka Eḻuttu .

app.note: The remaining portion of the line is left unengraved.
